code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt describes recurrent Body Aches over the past month. pt is a 50 yr old white female. o:Height 63 in, Weight 141 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 91, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 17 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

td.content: s:white female florist aged 50 years complains of Body Aches for 5 weeks. NKDA. ocas ETOH on w/e she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 62 in, Weight 137 lbs, Temperature 97.7 F, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered B burgdorferi IgG Serum.

content2.Unmatched: ocas ETOH on w/e she denies ever using cigarettes

td.content: s:a white F aged 51 ys presents with Body Aches x 6 days. denies any smoking ocas ETOH on w/e o:Height 63 in, Weight 142 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, B burgdorferi IgG Serum positive a:Lyme Disease p:administered ceftriaxone - 2 grams daily x 7 days, performed B burgdorferi IgG Serum, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
